title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 167-2.4 - Discretionary searches
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 167-2.4 - Discretionary searches

State Regulations
(a) The
following are subject to search at the discretion of the facility director: (1)
packages and bags; and
(2)
desks, lockers and office equipment used
by persons subject to this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
167-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
